content: drops christmas knitted drops mittens with nordic pattern in air drops extra 0-1197 drops design pattern no ai-026 yarn group c or a + a size one-size materials drops air from garnstudio 50 g color no 02 wheat 50 g color no 12 moss green drops double pointed needles size 4 mm / us 6 - or size needed to get 19 sts x 25 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm / us 4 for rib worked in the round on double pointed needles
